object.description: Type of object, in this case, 'price'.

active.description: Indicates if the price is currently active or not.

billing_scheme.description: Defines how the price interacts with the subscription's billing periods.

created.description: Timestamp representing when the price was created.

updated.description: Timestamp representing when the price was last updated.

custom_unit_amount.description: Custom unit amount for the price if set.

livemode.description: Indicates if the price is in live mode.

lookup_key.description: A reference key for the price used in lookup.

metadata.description: Custom metadata associated with the price.

product.description: The product associated with the price.

recurring.description: Recurring billing details for the price.

aggregate_usage.description: Specifies usage aggregation for the price if multiple subscriptions exist.

interval.description: Specifies how often the price should be billed.

interval_count.description: The number of intervals between each subscription billing.

trial_period_days.description: Number of days of trial period for the price.

usage_type.description: Specifies usage type for the price.

tax_behavior.description: Specifies the tax behavior for the price.

tiers_mode.description: Specifies pricing tiers mode for the price.

transform_quantity.description: Specifies how the quantity should be transformed before calculating the price.

type.description: Indicates the type of the price.

unit_amount_decimal.description: Unit amount in decimal format for the price.

is_deleted.description: Indicates if the price has been deleted.
